author: civanch
body:
The Geant4 problem of phase space decay was introduced for 10.2 release used in CMSSW_9_3_X. The problem was fixed for CMSSW_10_2_X.

Due to the request https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/prep-ops/5095/1/1/1/2/1/1/1/1/1/1/1.html  this PR is created.
title: Backport G4 bug in indexes inside decay class
